<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.IndoorMapConstants</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>IndoorMapConstants</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var IndoorMapConstants = Object.freeze({
    TABLES: {
        CMN_LOCATION: {
            name: 'cmn_location'
        },
        
        MAPCORE_CAMPUS: {
            name: 'sn_map_core_campus'
        },
        MAPCORE_BUILDING: {
            name: 'sn_map_core_building'
        },
        MAPCORE_FLOOR: {
            name: 'sn_map_core_floor'
        },
        MAPCORE_PLACE: {
            name: 'sn_map_core_place'
        },
        PLACE_TYPE: {
            name: 'sn_map_core_place_type'
        }
    },

    CMN_SOURCE: {
        Mappedin: 'mappedin',
        IndoorMaps: 'indoor_maps'
    },

    EVENTS: {
        // Triggered when the sync operations should be performed in background
        SYNC_EXEC_OPERATIONS: 'sn_map_core.sync_exec_operations',
        SYNC_EXEC_OPERATIONS_FOR_TYPES: 'sn_map_core.sync_exec_ops_types',
        SYNC_EXEC_OPERATIONS_FOR_CLEANING: 'sn_map_core.sync_exec_ops_clean'
    },
	
    type: 'IndoorMapConstants'
});
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-05-25 07:08:17</sys_created_on>

</record_update>
